Keywords: Animal , Martial Artist , Past , Spider-Man Family , Warrior
Real Name: Peter Porker
Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Elevated, Hindering
MY KIND OF ALLIES: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Martial Artist keyword gain the Spider-Man Family keyword.
IT'S CROW-NIN HUNTING SEASON: Blades/Claws/Fangs. // At the beginning of the game, choose an opposing character or team ability. FREE: Make a close attack, but only to target the chosen character or a character using the chosen team ability.
CALL IN HELP FROM THE SPIDER-VERSE!: When Spider-Hamurai hits an opposing character, if no character has been placed this turn, after resolutions you may roll a d6. 3-6: Place another friendly character with the Spider-Man Family keyword adjacent.
BUSHEEPDO HONOR: Combat Reflexes. // If Spider-Hamurai is adjacent to exactly 1 opposing character and neither is adjacent to any other characters, other characters can't be moved or placed adjacent to either of them and can't target either of them.

A solid piece, but I just wish he had two things: 1. Super Senses or Shape Change, I've lost him several times by not having an extra means of evading an attack. 2. ANIMAL KEYWORD!! I know it's been said before, but man, what a shame. Overall, can I just say that this little piggy has done very well in most of my games, taking out at least two figures before getting taken down.
